featured.cabarceno_description: Natural safari in a unique environment with more than 120 animal species

why.title: Why Cantabria and Spain?
why.subtitle: Discover the unique advantages of investing in northern Spain

climate.title: Privileged Climate
climate.description: Average annual temperature of 16°C. Cool summers and mild winters. The perfect Atlantic climate for year-round living.

security.title: Security and Stability
security.description: Spain is one of the safest countries in the world. Stable political system and robust legal framework for foreign investments.

nature.title: Exceptional Nature
nature.description: Between the Cantabrian Sea and Picos de Europa. Beaches, mountains, forests and spectacular caves just kilometers away.

accessibility.title: Excellent Connectivity
accessibility.description: Santander Airport with European connections. High-speed rail and highways connecting to Madrid and the rest of Europe.

culture.title: Rich Culture and Heritage
culture.description: Prehistoric caves of Altamira, Indian architecture, traditional festivals and world-renowned gastronomy.

investment.title: Investment Opportunity
investment.description: Competitive prices compared to other European coastal regions. High potential for appreciation and tourism profitability.

services.title: Comprehensive Services for International Buyers
services.subtitle: We accompany you throughout the purchase process and beyond

legal.title: Legal and Tax Advisory
legal.description: Lawyers specialized in international real estate transactions. Tax optimization for non-residents.

translation.title: Sworn Translation
translation.description: Official document translation service in your native language.

nie_visa.title: NIE and Visa Management
nie_visa.description: Complete processing of documentation for residence in Spain.

banking.title: Banking Services
banking.description: Account opening and international transfer management.

mortgage.title: Non-Resident Mortgages
mortgage.description: Specialized financing for foreign buyers up to 70%.

property_management.title: Post-Sale Management
property_management.description: Maintenance, vacation rental and complete management of your property.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you find your ideal home
